Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Glen
Reviews.Content: The camera/system has poor resolution and almost no color!  My bright green grass shows up gray.  The only things that come through in color are yellows and some shades of red.The resolution is so poor you can't read a automobile license tag 15 feet from the camera.Save your money, buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Have two that broke within 3 months of purchase.
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: These are nice looking and do a good job of recording. I installed them under my overhang of my house out of the weather. They both failed within 3 months. The camera power cord failed along with the camera on both. I did get one sent back and took me 3 weeks just to get there customer service on the line. When you return this junk do so on the website. You do have to pay for the shipping it to SVAT.  I paid good money for these cameras and am so disappointed. The real kicker was they sent me a new one but didn't even tell me what was wrong with the first one I returned. This manufacture need a lesson it customer service. Buy one with great reviews only.

Reviews.Title: wireless camera
Reviews.Author: ohcarol
Reviews.Content: we already had the main system just needed two more cameras------less then a week later  we watched someone break into the garage.  called 911 and got them.

Reviews.Title: It has Pro's and Cons
Reviews.Author: D. Eisenman
Reviews.Content: This system gets FIVE stars for ease of setup. The cameras paired up with the receiver very easily. The downside is: resolution at distances is pretty poor unless you have the 2X zoom on and even then it's tough to I.D. a person. The system says it's focused best at 20 feet which is accurate. The Night vision system works just as good as the day system. (Reviewers have complained about color and yes, color is not great,  however I want to be able to recognize faces, not tell what color clothing they're wearing).A note of caution for new users: Make sure the green lights on the wireless receiver that you want on are ON.. I hit the motion ON button twice on the system remote and turned recording OFF by accident (Extra frustrating since there was a theft next door last night!).Overall: If you want a specific spot monitored like a front door, this system is excellent. At distance - the zoom setting is helpful but not the best or clearest.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: cara taylor dugan
Reviews.Content: have 4 camera's hooked up to main screen, camera flash's no picture half the time ,always flashing no signal,very annoying. have disconnected.looking for a better wireless camera ?

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: splashy
Reviews.Content: It was easy to put up, paired easily, and gives me a birds eye view of my driveway. Sometimes it's a little slow to kick on, but I think that's because of the distance it has to see. I'm happy with the performance for the price.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: J. Ladore
Reviews.Content: this is a great affordable camera system, we use it to monitor our front door. we bought the whole system with the monitor. It caught someone stealing our amazon.com package. you can talk with someone at the door, it will alert you when visitor come. you can tranfer video to your computer or on disk.we love it!

Reviews.Title: Great wireless security camera.
Reviews.Author: Desert Dweller
Reviews.Content: Easy install, easy setup.  Great way to keep an eye on your property.  Great to see who's at the door without peeking out the window.

Reviews.Title: Really good surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: Fred C. Richards
Reviews.Content: Good resolution and night range of close to fifty feet. If you need to identify someone, this camera will do the trick.

Reviews.Title: I like these
Reviews.Author: ronson80
Reviews.Content: there mounted under the overhangs/Soffits and look down on the parking lot and do a super job.every thing plugs into the av jacks on back of tv.grab the remote hit vid and boom gotcha on th big screen.Rock on!

ProductInfo.Features:
Setup in seconds with digital wireless technology for clear video and audio
Expand your system to monitor multiple locations on your property
Motion detector is built into the camera to ensure that all movement is detected
Long range night vision camera can view up to 40ft away in the dark
24/7 lifetime live customer support is available through phone, email, and live web chat both before and after you buy
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT DIGITAL WIRELESS CAMERA PERP FOR GX301 SYSTEMS
